title: [Large-scale] Foundations of Model-Based Learning Design and Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online learning experience and computer application proficiency
context.additional_context: Asynchronous language learning program using learners' personal devices (BYOD). Focuses on applying learning design principles and data-driven analysis methods at introductory levels

learning_goals: Learners can design at least three simplified learning models suitable for the language learning process
Learners can interpret basic learning data collected from the LMS to identify individual progress status with 80% accuracy
Learners can apply two hierarchical control strategies to manage complexity arising during the instructional design process
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
